title: THE VALLEY BRANCH LIBRARY
description: Nestled in the heart of the business hub of St. George is the Valley Branch Library. Cozy, yet spacious, the library offers a healthy environment for study or relaxation. We provide children and adult services with special emphasis on community out-reach. Our branch also has a facility for free computer and Internet access as well as access to EBSCO online database which contains e-books journals, newspapers and magazines. A photocopying services for a nominal fee is also offered. You are welcome to join us on Mondays and Fridays for story reading and story-telling sessions from 3:15 p.m. to 4:00 p.m. Our regular hours are Monday to Friday 10:30 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. and 2:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.
